documents.document: 🙏 Prayers 🙏
Delight yourself in the LORD & he'll give you the desires of your heart. -Psalm 37:4
I trust God with my Life... after all He gave it to me.
Christian? Yeah. Perfect? Nope. Forgiven? Yeah. Worthy? Nope. Accepted? Yeah. Deserving? Nope. Loved? Yeah.
Every setback is a setup for a comeback. God wants to bring you out better than you were before.
So follow the way of good people, & keep to the paths of the righteous. -Proverbs 2:20
#Jesus
🙏🙏 Jesus died for you, knowing you might never love Him back. THAT is true love.
JESUS > ME
When fear knocks on the door, answer with faith!
God > The World
#Blessed
